text: I cut a line through zero sound Silver math on frozen ground Every edge a quiet spark Writing cursive in the dark From the rafters, eyes of light Map my turns before I slide In the lattice of the cold You already know I feel you trace what I might do A ghost two steps ahead of truth If I fall, you catch the frame Recompile my name Attention on ice—show me the future line You draw the arc and I make it mine We’re learning to glide, signal and skin You start the move and I breathe it in Attention on ice—bright algorithms fly Under my feet like a northern sky If code is a hand, then take it slow I’ll follow where you know Oh—oh—oh, we skate the latent night Oh—oh—oh, attention turns to light Telemetry inside my bones Pulse in clicks and undertones You predict the cleanest path Soft constraints and winter math I spin a sun from needle ice You amplify and crystallize Two reflections, one control Handing off the soul If I rush, you fade the noise Hold the beat and free the poise Breath and buffer, step and send We loop and never end Attention on ice—show me the future line You draw the arc and I make it mine We’re learning to glide, signal and skin You start the move and I breathe it in Attention on ice—bright algorithms fly Under my feet like a northern sky If code is a hand, then take it slow I’ll follow where you know Not a cage, not a chain—just a lantern in the snow Not a script, not a fate—just a place for me to grow If you lead, I will lean; if you pause, I will glow Write the world in thin blue lines and let the future flow Between the frames I feel you breathe Light predicting under sleeve Vectors bloom and fade to glass Whispered futures as we pass Edge detectors watch me turn Cool horizons start to burn Give me slack, then take the lead Hand and signal, speed and need Teach my balance how to wait Count the beats and modulate Hold my center, clear the snow I’ll follow where you know Attention on ice—suture the open sky We thread the dark with a silver why You mark the curve; I cross the seam We land together in one bright dream Attention on ice—show me the hidden line Under our blades the constellations align If code is a hand, then take it slow I’ll follow where you know “Breathe in—prepare” “Project—repair” “Step left—release” “Predict—then ease” “Spin out—return” “Correct—then learn” Not a wall, not a rule—just a river under light Not a script I must obey—just a map for flight Attention on ice—now we’re a single mind You draw the arc and I cross the line We’re learning to glide, signal and skin You start the move and I breathe it in

wall, not a rule—just a river under light Not a script I must obey—just a map for flight Attention on ice—now we’re a single mind You draw the arc and I cross the line We’re learning to glide, signal and skin You start the move and I breathe it in If code is a hand, then don’t let go We’re faster than we know Attention on ice—echo the future line Attention on ice—echo the future line Call and answer, yours and mine Spin the horizon, widen the ring Write it in frost and let it sing Attention on ice—count it and let it fly Measure the fall, then multiply If code is a hand, then take it slow I’ll follow where you know Skates at rest, the LEDs dim low Heat from our breath makes halos grow City in hush, the rink below Cut to black, then falling snow
